name: Discord Send Message
description:
This tool sends a message to a specific Discord channel using a bot. It can also be used to reply to an existing message or mention a user.

How to Use:

1.  Provide your Discord Bot Token for authentication. You need to set it up first (https://discord.com/developers/applications), and give the required permissions.
2.  Set the ID of the channel where the message will be sent (numeric ID).
3.  Write the text for your message.
4.  Optional : Add the ID of a message to reply to it (numeric ID).
5.  Optional : Add users' ID to mention them  (numeric ID).
